program.name: gnome

module.name: nautilus
gnome-vfs
gnome-themes
gnome-mag
libcroco
gedit
module.configure:
case "${SB_SYSTYPE}" in *-aix*) CC=xlc CFLAGS="-O2 -qmaxmem=-1 -qarch=com" LDFLAGS="-Wl,-brtl -Wl,-blibpath:/usr/lib" ;; *-hpux*) CC=cc CFLAGS="+O2 -z +ESlit +Onofltacc +DAportable \ +Oentrysched +Odataprefetch +Onolimit" ;; *-irix6*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-Wl,-woff,84 -Wl,-woff,85 -woff 1429 -O2 \ -OPT:Olimit=0" ;; *-linux*) ARGS="--enable-xinerama" ASPELL_LIB=${SB_VAR_LIBASPELL_LIB} ;; *-osf*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-O2 -msym -readonly_strings" ;; *-solaris2.[89]) CFLAGS="-O2 -mcpu=v8" ;; *-solaris2*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-mr -Qn -xstrconst -xO2 -xtarget=generic" ;; esac
./configure CC="${CC:-gcc}" CFLAGS="${CFLAGS:--O2}" \ CPPFLAGS="-I${SB_VAR_LIBPOPT_INC} -I${SB_VAR_GETTEXT_INC} \ -I${SB_VAR_LIBASPELL_INC}" LDFLAGS="-L${SB_VAR_LIBPOPT_LIB} \ -L${SB_VAR_GETTEXT_LIB} -L${SB_VAR_FCPACKAGE_LIB} \ -L${ASPELL_LIB:-${SB_VAR_LIBASPELL_LIB}/gcc32} \ ${CC_LD_RT}${ASPELL_LIB:-${SB_VAR_LIBASPELL_LIB}/gcc32}:\ ${SB_VAR_LIBPOPT_LIB}${SB_VAR_LIBOPENSSL+:${SB_VAR_LIBOPENSSL_LIB}} \ ${LDFLAGS+${LDFLAGS}}" PKG_CONFIG_PATH="${SB_VAR_LIBGLIB_LIB}/pkgconfig:\ ${SB_VAR_LIBATK_LIB}/pkgconfig:${SB_VAR_LIBPANGO_LIB}/pkgconfig:\ ${SB_VAR_LIBGTK_LIB}/pkgconfig:${SB_VAR_FCPACKAGE_LIB}/pkgconfig:\ ${SB_VAR_LIBTTF_LIB}/pkgconfig:${SB_VAR_LIBGLADE_LIB}/pkgconfig:\ ${SB_VAR_LIBXML_LIB}/pkgconfig:${LIBART_LIB}/pkgconfig:\ ${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX}/lib/pkgconfig:${SB_VAR_GETTEXT_LIB}/pkgconfig\ ${SB_VAR_LIBICONV+:${SB_VAR_LIBICONV_LIB}/pkgconfig}" \ --datadir="${_datadir}" --sysconfdir="${_sysconfdir}" \ --localstatedir="${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX}/lib" \ --enable-shared --enable-static --disable-dependency-tracking \ --prefix=${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX}

module.name: gucharmap
module.configure:
case "${SB_SYSTYPE}" in *-aix*) CC=xlc CFLAGS="-O2 -qmaxmem=-1 -qarch=com" LDFLAGS="-Wl,-brtl -Wl,-blibpath:/usr/lib" ;; *-hpux*) CC=cc CFLAGS="+O2 -z +ESlit +Onofltacc +DAportable \ +Oentrysched +Odataprefetch +Onolimit" ;; *-irix6*) CC=c99 CFLAGS="-Wl,-woff,84 -Wl,-woff,85 -woff 1429 -O2 \ -OPT:Olimit=0" ;; *-linux*) ARGS="--enable-xinerama" ;; *-osf*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-O2 -msym -readonly_strings" ;; *-solaris2.[89]) CFLAGS="-O2 -mcpu=v8" ;; *-solaris2*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-mr -Qn -xstrconst -xO2 -xtarget=generic" ;; esac
./configure CC="${CC:-gcc}" CFLAGS="${CFLAGS:--O2}" \ CPPFLAGS="-I${SB_VAR_LIBPOPT_INC} -I${SB_VAR_GETTEXT_INC}" \ LDFLAGS="-L${SB_VAR_LIBPOPT_LIB} -L${SB_VAR_GETTEXT_LIB} \ ${CC_LD_RT}${SB_VAR_LIBPOPT_LIB}\ ${SB_VAR_LIBOPENSSL+:${SB_VAR_LIBOPENSSL_LIB}} ${LDFLAGS+${LDFLAGS}}" \ PKG_CONFIG_PATH="${SB_VAR_LIBGLIB_LIB}/pkgconfig:\ ${SB_VAR_LIBATK_LIB}/pkgconfig:${SB_VAR_LIBPANGO_LIB}/pkgconfig:\ ${SB_VAR_LIBGTK_LIB}/pkgconfig:${SB_VAR_FCPACKAGE_LIB}/pkgconfig:\ ${SB_VAR_LIBTTF_LIB}/pkgconfig:${SB_VAR_LIBGLADE_LIB}/pkgconfig:\ ${SB_VAR_LIBXML_LIB}/pkgconfig:${LIBART_LIB}/pkgconfig:\ ${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX}/lib/pkgconfig:${SB_VAR_GETTEXT_LIB}/pkgconfig\ ${SB_VAR_LIBICONV+:${SB_VAR_LIBICONV_LIB}/pkgconfig}" \ --datadir="${_datadir}" --disable-dependency-tracking \ --enable-shared --enable-static --prefix=${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX}

module.name: libgtkhtml
gcalctool
module.configure:
case "${SB_SYSTYPE}" in *-aix*) CC=xlc CFLAGS="-O2 -qmaxmem=-1 -qarch=com" LDFLAGS="-Wl,-brtl -Wl,-blibpath:/usr/lib" ;; *-hpux*) CC=cc CFLAGS="+O2 -z +ESlit +Onofltacc +DAportable \ +Oentrysched +Odataprefetch +Onolimit" ;; *-irix6*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-Wl,-woff,84 -Wl,-woff,85 -woff 1429 -O2 \ -OPT:Olimit=0" ;; *-osf*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-O2 -msym -readonly_strings" ;; *-solaris2.[89]) CFLAGS="-O2 -mcpu=v8" ;; *-solaris2*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-mr -Qn -xstrconst -xO2 -xtarget=generic" ;; esac
./configure CC="${CC:-gcc}" CFLAGS="${CFLAGS:--O2}" \ CPPFLAGS="-I${SB_VAR_LIBPOPT_INC} -I${SB_VAR_GETTEXT_INC}" \ LDFLAGS="-L${SB_VAR_LIBPOPT_LIB} -L${SB_VAR_GETTEXT_LIB} \ -L${SB_VAR_FCPACKAGE_LIB} ${CC_LD_RT}${SB_VAR_LIBPOPT_LIB}\ ${SB_VAR_LIBOPENSSL+:${SB_VAR_LIBOPENSSL_LIB}} ${LDFLAGS+${LDFLAGS}}" \ PKG_CONFIG_PATH="${SB_VAR_LIBGLIB_LIB}/pkgconfig:\ ${SB_VAR_LIBATK_LIB}/pkgconfig:${SB_VAR_LIBPANGO_LIB}/pkgconfig:\ ${SB_VAR_LIBGTK_LIB}/pkgconfig:${SB_VAR_FCPACKAGE_LIB}/pkgconfig:\ ${SB_VAR_LIBTTF_LIB}/pkgconfig:${SB_VAR_LIBART_LIB}/pkgconfig:\ ${SB_VAR_LIBXML_LIB}/pkgconfig:${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX}/lib/pkgconfig:\ ${SB_VAR_GETTEXT_LIB}/pkgconfig\ ${SB_VAR_LIBICONV+:${SB_VAR_LIBICONV_LIB}/pkgconfig}" \ --datadir="${_datadir}" --sysconfdir="${_sysconfdir}" \ --enable-gconf-source="xml::${_sysconfdir}/gconf/gconf.xml.defaults" \ --disable-dependency-tracking --enable-shared --enable-static \ --prefix=${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX}

module.name: gnome-applets
module.configure:
case "${SB_SYSTYPE}" in *-aix*) CC=xlc CFLAGS="-O2 -qmaxmem=-1 -qarch=com" LDFLAGS="-Wl,-brtl -Wl,-blibpath:/usr/lib" ARGS="--disable-ipv6" ;; *-hpux*) CC=cc CFLAGS="+O2 -z +ESlit +Onofltacc +DAportable \ +Oentrysched +Odataprefetch +Onolimit" ARGS="--disable-ipv6" ;; *-irix6*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-Wl,-woff,84 -Wl,-woff,85 -woff 1429 -O2 -OPT:Olimit=0" ARGS="--disable-ipv6" ;; *-linux*) ARGS="--enable-xinerama --enable-ipv6" ;; *-osf*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-O2 -msym -readonly_strings" ARGS="--disable-ipv6" ;; *-solaris2.[89]) CFLAGS="-O2 -mcpu=v8" ARGS="--enable-ipv6" ;; *-solaris2*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-mr -Qn -xstrconst -xO2 -xtarget=generic" ARGS="--disable-ipv6" ;; esac
./configure CC="${CC:-gcc}" CFLAGS="${CFLAGS:--O2}" \ CPPFLAGS="-I${SB_VAR_LIBPOPT_INC} -I${SB_VAR_GETTEXT_INC}" \ LDFLAGS="-L${SB_VAR_LIBPOPT_LIB} -L${SB_VAR_GETTEXT_LIB} \ -L${SB_VAR_FCPACKAGE_LIB} ${CC_LD_RT}${SB_VAR_LIBPOPT_LIB}\ ${SB_VAR_LIBOPENSSL+:${SB_VAR_LIBOPENSSL_LIB}} ${LDFLAGS+${LDFLAGS}}" \ PKG_CONFIG_PATH="${SB_VAR_LIBGLIB_LIB}/pkgconfig:\ ${SB_VAR_LIBATK_LIB}/pkgconfig:${SB_VAR_LIBPANGO_LIB}/pkgconfig:\ ${SB_VAR_LIBGTK_LIB}/pkgconfig:${SB_VAR_FCPACKAGE_LIB}/pkgconfig:\ ${SB_VAR_LIBTTF_LIB}/pkgconfig:${SB_VAR_LIBXML_LIB}/pkgconfig:\ ${SB_VAR_LIBGLADE_LIB}/pkgconfig:${LIBART_LIB}/pkgconfig:\ ${SB_VAR_LIBAUDIOFILE_LIB}/pkgconfig:${SB_VAR_ESOUND_LIB}/pkgconfig:\ ${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX}/lib/pkgconfig:${SB_VAR_GETTEXT_LIB}/pkgconfig\ ${SB_VAR_LIBICONV+:${SB_VAR_LIBICONV_LIB}/pkgconfig}\ ${SB_VAR_LIBXKLAVIER+:${SB_VAR_LIBXKLAVIER_LIB}/pkgconfig}" \ --datadir="${_datadir}" --sysconfdir="${_sysconfdir}" \ --localstatedir="${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX}/lib" \ --disable-dependency-tracking ${ARGS+${ARGS}} \ --prefix=${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX}
module.build: # <sys/audio.h> only in Solaris 8+ case "${SB_SYSTYPE}" in *-solaris2.[67]) gmake cdplayer_SUBDIRS= ;; *) gmake ;; esac
module.install: # <sys/audio.h> only in Solaris 8+ case "${SB_SYSTYPE}" in *-solaris2.[67]) gmake cdplayer_SUBDIRS= install ;; *) gmake install ;; esac

module.name: zenity
module.configure:
case "${SB_SYSTYPE}" in *-aix*) CC=xlc CFLAGS="-O2 -qmaxmem=-1 -qarch=com" LDFLAGS="-Wl,-brtl -Wl,-blibpath:/usr/lib" ;; *-hpux*) CC=cc CFLAGS="+O2 -z +ESlit +Onofltacc +DAportable \ +Oentrysched +Odataprefetch +Onolimit" ;; *-irix6*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-Wl,-woff,84 -Wl,-woff,85 -woff 1429 -O2 \ -OPT:Olimit=0" ;; *-linux*) ARGS="--enable-xinerama" ;; *-osf*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-O2 -msym -readonly_strings" ;; *-solaris2.[89]) CFLAGS="-O2 -mcpu=v8" ;; *-solaris2*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-mr -Qn -xstrconst -xO2 -xtarget=generic" ;; esac
./configure CC="${CC:-gcc}" CFLAGS="${CFLAGS:--O2}" \ CPPFLAGS="-I${SB_VAR_LIBPOPT_INC} -I${SB_VAR_GETTEXT_INC}" \ LDFLAGS="-L${SB_VAR_LIBPOPT_LIB} -L${SB_VAR_GETTEXT_LIB} \ -L${SB_VAR_FCPACKAGE_LIB} ${CC_LD_RT}${SB_VAR_LIBPOPT_LIB}:\ ${SB_VAR_GETTEXT_LIB} ${LDFLAGS+${LDFLAGS}}" \ PKG_CONFIG_PATH="${SB_VAR_LIBGLIB_LIB}/pkgconfig:\ ${SB_VAR_LIBATK_LIB}/pkgconfig:${SB_VAR_LIBPANGO_LIB}/pkgconfig:\ ${SB_VAR_LIBGTK_LIB}/pkgconfig:${SB_VAR_FCPACKAGE_LIB}/pkgconfig:\ ${SB_VAR_LIBTTF_LIB}/pkgconfig:${SB_VAR_LIBGLADE_LIB}/pkgconfig:\ ${SB_VAR_LIBXML_LIB}/pkgconfig:${LIBART_LIB}/pkgconfig:\ ${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX}/lib/pkgconfig:${SB_VAR_GETTEXT_LIB}/pkgconfig\ ${SB_VAR_LIBICONV+:${SB_VAR_LIBICONV_LIB}/pkgconfig}" \ --datadir="${_datadir}" --disable-dependency-tracking \ --enable-shared --enable-static --prefix=${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX}

module.name: GConf
at-spi
libgnomeprintui
control-center
libgsf
gnome-desktop
intltool
vte
eel
ORBit2
module.configure:
case "${SB_SYSTYPE}" in *-aix*) CC=xlc CFLAGS="-O2 -qmaxmem=-1 -qarch=com" LDFLAGS="-Wl,-brtl -Wl,-blibpath:/usr/lib" ;; *-osf*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-O2 -msym -readonly_strings" ;; *-hpux*) CC=cc CFLAGS="+O2 -z +ESlit +Onofltacc +DAportable \ +Oentrysched +Odataprefetch +Onolimit" ;; *-irix6*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-Wl,-woff,84 -Wl,-woff,85 -woff 1429 -O2 \ -OPT:Olimit=0" ;; *-solaris2.[89]) CFLAGS="-O2 -mcpu=v8" ;; *-solaris2*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-mr -Qn -xstrconst -xO2 -xtarget=generic" ;; esac
./configure CC="${CC:-gcc}" CFLAGS="${CFLAGS:--O2}" \ CPPFLAGS="-I${SB_VAR_LIBPOPT_INC} \ ${SB_VAR_LIBOPENSSL+-I${SB_VAR_LIBOPENSSL_INC}}" \ LDFLAGS="-L${SB_VAR_LIBPOPT_LIB} ${CC_LD_RT}${SB_VAR_LIBPOPT_LIB}\ ${SB_VAR_LIBOPENSSL+:${SB_VAR_LIBOPENSSL_LIB}} ${LDFLAGS+${LDFLAGS}}" \ PKG_CONFIG_PATH="${SB_VAR_LIBGLIB_LIB}/pkgconfig:\ ${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX}/lib/pkgconfig:${SB_VAR_LIBIDL_LIB}/pkgconfig:\ ${SB_VAR_GETTEXT_LIB}/pkgconfig\ ${SB_VAR_LIBICONV+:${SB_VAR_LIBICONV_LIB}/pkgconfig}\ ${SB_VAR_GTKDOC+:${SB_VAR_GTKDOC}/lib/pkgconfig}" \ --datadir="${_datadir}" --with-html-dir="${_docdir}/html" \ --disable-indent --disable-dependency-tracking \ --prefix=${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX}
${SB_PATH_SHTOOL} subst -q -e "\ s!-L\(\$libdir\)!-L\1 ${CC_LD_RT}\1 !g" orbit2-config
for _pc in ORBit-2.0.pc ORBit-CosNaming-2.0.pc \ ORBit-imodule-2.0.pc src/idl-compiler/ORBit-idl-2.0.pc; do ${SB_PATH_SHTOOL} subst -q -e "\ s!-L\(\${libdir}\)!-L\1 ${CC_LD_RT}\1!" ${_pc} done

module.name: startup-notification
librsvg
gob
module.configure:
case "${SB_SYSTYPE}" in *-aix*) CC=xlc CFLAGS="-O2 -qmaxmem=-1 -qarch=com" LDFLAGS="-Wl,-brtl -Wl,-blibpath:/usr/lib" ;; *-hpux*) CC=cc CFLAGS="+O2 -z +ESlit +Onofltacc +DAportable \ +Oentrysched +Odataprefetch +Onolimit" ;; *-irix6*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-Wl,-woff,84 -Wl,-woff,85 -woff 1429 -O2 \ -OPT:Olimit=0" ;; *-linux*) ARGS="--enable-xinerama" ;; *-osf*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-O2 -msym -readonly_strings" ;; *-solaris2.[89]) CFLAGS="-O2 -mcpu=v8" ;; *-solaris2*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-mr -Qn -xstrconst -xO2 -xtarget=generic" ;; esac
./configure CC="${CC:-gcc}" CFLAGS="${CFLAGS:--O2}" \ CPPFLAGS="-I${SB_VAR_LIBPOPT_INC}" LDFLAGS="-L${SB_VAR_LIBPOPT_LIB} \ ${CC_LD_RT}${SB_VAR_LIBPOPT_LIB} ${LDFLAGS+${LDFLAGS}}" \ PKG_CONFIG_PATH="${SB_VAR_LIBGLIB_LIB}/pkgconfig:\ ${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX}/lib/pkgconfig:${SB_VAR_GETTEXT_LIB}/pkgconfig\ ${SB_VAR_LIBICONV+:${SB_VAR_LIBICONV_LIB}/pkgconfig}" \ --datadir="${_datadir}" --disable-dependency-tracking \ --prefix=${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX}

module.name: libgnome
libgail-gnome
libgnomeprint
ggv
module.configure:
case "${SYSTYPE}" in *-aix*) CC=xlc CFLAGS="-O2 -qmaxmem=-1 -qarch=com" LDFLAGS="-Wl,-brtl -Wl,-blibpath:/usr/lib" ;; *-hpux*) CC=cc CFLAGS="+O2 -z +ESlit +Onofltacc +DAportable \ +Oentrysched +Odataprefetch +Onolimit" ;; *-irix6*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-Wl,-woff,84 -Wl,-woff,85 -woff 1429 -O2 \ -OPT:Olimit=0" ;; *-osf*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-O2 -msym -readonly_strings" ;; *-solaris2.[89]) CFLAGS="-O2 -mcpu=v8" ;; *-solaris2*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-mr -Qn -xstrconst -xO2 -xtarget=generic" ;; esac
./configure CC="${CC:-gcc}" CFLAGS="${CFLAGS:--O2}" \ CPPFLAGS="-I${SB_VAR_LIBPOPT_INC} -I${SB_VAR_GETTEXT_INC}" \ LDFLAGS="-L${SB_VAR_LIBPOPT_LIB} -L${SB_VAR_GETTEXT_LIB} \ -L${SB_VAR_FCPACKAGE_LIB} ${CC_LD_RT}${SB_VAR_LIBPOPT_LIB}\ ${SB_VAR_LIBOPENSSL+:${SB_VAR_LIBOPENSSL_LIB}} ${LDFLAGS+${LDFLAGS}}" \ PKG_CONFIG_PATH="${SB_VAR_LIBGLIB_LIB}/pkgconfig:\ ${SB_VAR_LIBGTK_LIB}/pkgconfig:${SB_VAR_LIBPANGO_LIB}/pkgconfig:\ ${SB_VAR_LIBATK_LIB}/pkgconfig:${SB_VAR_FCPACKAGE_LIB}/pkgconfig:\ ${SB_VAR_LIBTTF_LIB}/pkgconfig:${SB_VAR_LIBXML_LIB}/pkgconfig:\ ${SB_VAR_LIBART_LIB}/pkgconfig:${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX}/lib/pkgconfig:\ ${SB_VAR_GETTEXT_LIB}/pkgconfig\ ${SB_VAR_LIBICONV+:${SB_VAR_LIBICONV_LIB}/pkgconfig}" \ --datadir="${_datadir}" --sysconfdir="${_sysconfdir}" \ --with-gconf-source="xml::${_sysconfdir}/gconf/gconf.xml.defaults" \ --with-gconf-schema-file-dir="${_sysconfdir}/gconf/schemas" \ --localstatedir="${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX}/lib" \ --with-gs=${SB_VAR_GHOSTSCRIPT}/bin/gs --enable-shared \ --enable-static --disable-dependency-tracking \ --prefix=${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX}

module.name: libgtop
module.configure:
case "${SB_SYSTYPE}" in *-aix*) CC=xlc CFLAGS="-O2 -qmaxmem=-1 -qarch=com" LDFLAGS="-Wl,-brtl -Wl,-blibpath:/usr/lib" ;; *-hpux*) CC=cc CFLAGS="+O2 -z +ESlit +Onofltacc +DAportable \ +Oentrysched +Odataprefetch +Onolimit" ;; *-irix6*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-Wl,-woff,84 -Wl,-woff,85 -woff 1429 -O2 \ -OPT:Olimit=0" ;; *-osf*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-O2 -msym -readonly_strings" ;; *-solaris2.[89]) CFLAGS="-O2 -mcpu=v8" ;; *-solaris2*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-mr -Qn -xstrconst -xO2 -xtarget=generic" ;; esac
./configure CC="${CC:-gcc}" CFLAGS="${CFLAGS:--O2}" \ CPPFLAGS="-I${SB_VAR_LIBPOPT_INC} -I${SB_VAR_GETTEXT_INC}" \ LDFLAGS="-L${SB_VAR_LIBPOPT_LIB} -L${SB_VAR_GETTEXT_LIB} \ ${LDFLAGS+${LDFLAGS}}" PKG_CONFIG_PATH="${SB_VAR_LIBGLIB_LIB}/pkgconfig:\ ${SB_VAR_GETTEXT_LIB}/pkgconfig\ ${SB_VAR_LIBICONV+:${SB_VAR_LIBICONV_LIB}/pkgconfig}" \ --datadir="${_datadir}" --localstatedir="${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX}/lib" \ --enable-shared --enable-static --disable-dependency-tracking \ --prefix=${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX}
gmake configure
for _pc in libgtop-2.0.pc; do ${SB_PATH_SHTOOL} subst -q -e "\ s!-L\(\${libdir}\)!-L\1 ${CC_LD_RT}\1!" ${_pc} done

module.name: gnome-terminal
module.configure:
case "${SB_SYSTYPE}" in *-aix*) CC=xlc CFLAGS="-O2 -qmaxmem=-1 -qarch=com" LDFLAGS="-Wl,-brtl -Wl,-blibpath:/usr/lib" ;; *-hpux*) CC=cc CFLAGS="+O2 -z +ESlit +Onofltacc +DAportable \ +Oentrysched +Odataprefetch +Onolimit" ;; *-irix6*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-Wl,-woff,84 -Wl,-woff,85 -woff 1429 -O2 \ -OPT:Olimit=0" ;; *-linux*) ARGS="--enable-xinerama" ;; *-osf*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-O2 -msym -readonly_strings" ;; *-solaris2.[89]) CFLAGS="-O2 -mcpu=v8" ;; *-solaris2*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-mr -Qn -xstrconst -xO2 -xtarget=generic" ;; esac
./configure CC="${CC:-gcc}" CFLAGS="${CFLAGS:--O2}" \ CPPFLAGS="-I${SB_VAR_LIBPOPT_INC} -I${SB_VAR_GETTEXT_INC}" \ LDFLAGS="-L${SB_VAR_LIBPOPT_LIB} -L${SB_VAR_GETTEXT_LIB} \ -L${SB_VAR_FCPACKAGE_LIB} ${CC_LD_RT}${SB_VAR_LIBPOPT_LIB}:\ ${SB_VAR_LIBOPENSSL_LIB} ${LDFLAGS+${LDFLAGS}}" \ PKG_CONFIG_PATH="${SB_VAR_LIBGLIB_LIB}/pkgconfig:\ ${SB_VAR_LIBATK_LIB}/pkgconfig:${SB_VAR_LIBPANGO_LIB}/pkgconfig:\ ${SB_VAR_LIBGTK_LIB}/pkgconfig:${SB_VAR_LIBGLADE_LIB}/pkgconfig:\ ${SB_VAR_LIBXML_LIB}/pkgconfig:${LIBART_LIB}/pkgconfig:\ ${SB_VAR_FCPACKAGE_LIB}/pkgconfig:${SB_VAR_LIBTTF_LIB}/pkgconfig:\ ${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX}/lib/pkgconfig:${SB_VAR_GETTEXT_LIB}/pkgconfig\ ${SB_VAR_LIBICONV+:${SB_VAR_LIBICONV_LIB}/pkgconfig}" \ --datadir="${_datadir}" --sysconfdir="${_sysconfdir}" \ --localstatedir="${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX}/lib" \ --disable-dependency-tracking --prefix=${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX}

module.name: gconf-editor
module.configure:
case "${SB_SYSTYPE}" in *-aix*) CC=xlc CFLAGS="-O2 -qmaxmem=-1 -qarch=com" LDFLAGS="-Wl,-brtl -Wl,-blibpath:/usr/lib" ;; *-hpux*) CC=cc CFLAGS="+O2 -z +ESlit +Onofltacc +DAportable \ +Oentrysched +Odataprefetch +Onolimit" ;; *-irix6*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-Wl,-woff,84 -Wl,-woff,85 -woff 1429 -O2 \ -OPT:Olimit=0" ;; *-linux*) ARGS="--enable-xinerama" ;; *-osf*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-O2 -msym -readonly_strings" ;; *-solaris2.[89]) CFLAGS="-O2 -mcpu=v8" ;; *-solaris2*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-mr -Qn -xstrconst -xO2 -xtarget=generic" ;; esac
./configure CC="${CC:-gcc}" CFLAGS="${CFLAGS:--O2}" \ CPPFLAGS="-I${SB_VAR_LIBPOPT_INC} -I${SB_VAR_GETTEXT_INC}" \ LDFLAGS="-L${SB_VAR_LIBPOPT_LIB} -L${SB_VAR_GETTEXT_LIB} \ -L${SB_VAR_FCPACKAGE_LIB} ${CC_LD_RT}${SB_VAR_LIBPOPT_LIB} \ ${LDFLAGS+${LDFLAGS}}" PKG_CONFIG_PATH="${SB_VAR_LIBGLIB_LIB}/pkgconfig:\ ${SB_VAR_LIBATK_LIB}/pkgconfig:${SB_VAR_LIBPANGO_LIB}/pkgconfig:\ ${SB_VAR_LIBGTK_LIB}/pkgconfig:${SB_VAR_FCPACKAGE_LIB}/pkgconfig:\ ${SB_VAR_LIBTTF_LIB}/pkgconfig:${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX}/lib/pkgconfig:\ ${SB_VAR_GETTEXT_LIB}/pkgconfig\ ${SB_VAR_LIBICONV+:${SB_VAR_LIBICONV_LIB}/pkgconfig}" \ --datadir="${_datadir}" --sysconfdir="${_sysconfdir}" \ --enable-shared --enable-static --disable-dependency-tracking \ --prefix=${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX}

module.name: file-roller
module.configure:
case "${SYSTYPE}" in *-aix*) CC=xlc CFLAGS="-O2 -qmaxmem=-1 -qarch=com" LDFLAGS="-Wl,-brtl -Wl,-blibpath:/usr/lib" ;; *-hpux*) CC=cc CFLAGS="+O2 -z +ESlit +Onofltacc +DAportable \ +Oentrysched +Odataprefetch +Onolimit" ;; *-irix6*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-Wl,-woff,84 -Wl,-woff,85 -woff 1429 -O2 \ -OPT:Olimit=0" ;; *-osf*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-O2 -msym -readonly_strings" ;; *-solaris2.[89]) CFLAGS="-O2 -mcpu=v8" ;; *-solaris2*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-mr -Qn -xstrconst -xO2 -xtarget=generic" ;; esac
./configure CC="${CC:-gcc}" CFLAGS="${CFLAGS:--O2}" \ CPPFLAGS="-I${SB_VAR_LIBPOPT_INC} -I${SB_VAR_GETTEXT_INC}" \ LDFLAGS="-L${SB_VAR_LIBPOPT_LIB} -L${SB_VAR_GETTEXT_LIB} \ -L${SB_VAR_FCPACKAGE_LIB} ${CC_LD_RT}${SB_VAR_LIBPOPT_LIB}\ ${SB_VAR_LIBOPENSSL+:${SB_VAR_LIBOPENSSL_LIB}} \ ${LDFLAGS+${LDFLAGS}}" PKG_CONFIG_PATH="${LIBGLIB_LIB}/pkgconfig:\ ${SB_VAR_LIBGTK_LIB}/pkgconfig:${SB_VAR_LIBPANGO_LIB}/pkgconfig:\ ${SB_VAR_LIBATK_LIB}/pkgconfig:${SB_VAR_FCPACKAGE_LIB}/pkgconfig:\ ${SB_VAR_LIBTTF_LIB}/pkgconfig:${SB_VAR_LIBXML_LIB}/pkgconfig:\ ${SB_VAR_LIBART_LIB}/pkgconfig:${SB_VAR_LIBGLADE_LIB}/pkgconfig:\ ${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX}/lib/pkgconfig:${SB_VAR_GETTEXT_LIB}/pkgconfig\ ${SB_VAR_LIBICONV+:${SB_VAR_LIBICONV_LIB}/pkgconfig}" \ --datadir="${_datadir}" --enable-shared --enable-static \ --disable-dependency-tracking --prefix=${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX}

module.name: gnome-panel
gnome2-user-docs
gpdf
module.configure:
case "${SB_SYSTYPE}" in *-aix*) CC=xlc CFLAGS="-O2 -qmaxmem=-1 -qarch=com" LDFLAGS="-Wl,-brtl -Wl,-blibpath:/usr/lib:/lib" CC_LD_RT="-Wl,-blibpath:" ;; *-hpux*) CC=cc CFLAGS="+O2 -z +ESlit +Onofltacc +DAportable \ +Oentrysched +Odataprefetch +Onolimit" CXX=aCC CXXFLAGS="+O2 -AA -z +Onofltacc +ESlit +DAportable \ +Oentrysched +Odataprefetch +Onolimit" ;; *-irix6*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-Wl,-woff,84 -Wl,-woff,85 -woff 1429 -O2 -OPT:Olimit=0" CXX=CC CXXFLAGS="-Wl,-woff,84 -Wl,-woff,85 -woff 1429 -O2 -OPT:Olimit=0" ;; *-osf*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-O2 -msym -readonly_strings" CXX=cxx CXXFLAGS="-O2 -msym -readonly_strings" ;; *-solaris2.[89]) CFLAGS="-O2 -mcpu=v8" CXXFLAGS="-O2 -mcpu=v8" ;; *-solaris2*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-mr -Qn -xstrconst -xO2 -xtarget=generic" CXX=CC CXXFLAGS="-xO2 -xtarget=generic" ;; esac
./configure CC="${CC:-gcc}" CFLAGS="${CFLAGS:--O2}" \ CXX="${CXX:-g++}" CXXFLAGS="${CXXFLAGS:--O2}" \ CPPFLAGS="-I${SB_VAR_LIBPOPT_INC} -I${SB_VAR_GETTEXT_INC}" \ LDFLAGS="-L${SB_VAR_LIBPOPT_LIB} -L${SB_VAR_GETTEXT_LIB} \ -L${SB_VAR_FCPACKAGE_LIB} ${CC_LD_RT}${SB_VAR_LIBPOPT_LIB}\ ${GCC_RT+:${GCC_RT_LIB}}${SB_VAR_LIBOPENSSL+:${SB_VAR_LIBOPENSSL_LIB}} \ ${LDFLAGS+${LDFLAGS}}" PKG_CONFIG_PATH="${SB_VAR_LIBGLIB_LIB}/pkgconfig:\ ${SB_VAR_LIBATK_LIB}/pkgconfig:${SB_VAR_LIBPANGO_LIB}/pkgconfig:\ ${SB_VAR_LIBGTK_LIB}/pkgconfig:${SB_VAR_FCPACKAGE_LIB}/pkgconfig:\ ${SB_VAR_LIBTTF_LIB}/pkgconfig:${SB_VAR_LIBART_LIB}/pkgconfig:\ ${SB_VAR_LIBXML_LIB}/pkgconfig:${SB_VAR_LIBGLADE_LIB}/pkgconfig:\ ${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX}/lib/pkgconfig:${SB_VAR_GETTEXT_LIB}/pkgconfig\ ${SB_VAR_LIBICONV+:${SB_VAR_LIBICONV_LIB}/pkgconfig}" \ --datadir="${_datadir}" --sysconfdir="${_sysconfdir}" \ --disable-dependency-tracking --enable-shared --enable-static \ --with-appdef-dir=${INSTALL_PREFIX}/lib/app-defaults --enable-opi \ --prefix=${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX}

module.name: gnome-mime-data
gail
gnome-utils
module.configure:
case "${SB_SYSTYPE}" in *-aix*) CC=xlc CFLAGS="-O2 -qmaxmem=-1 -qarch=com" LDFLAGS="-Wl,-brtl -Wl,-blibpath:/usr/lib" ARGS="--disable-ipv6" ;; *-hpux*) CC=cc CFLAGS="+O2 -z +ESlit +Onofltacc +DAportable \ +Oentrysched +Odataprefetch +Onolimit" ARGS="--disable-ipv6" ;; *-irix6*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-Wl,-woff,84 -Wl,-woff,85 -woff 1429 -O2 -OPT:Olimit=0" LDFLAGS="-L${LIBTTF_LIB}" ARGS="--disable-ipv6" ;; *-linux*) ARGS="--enable-xinerama --enable-ipv6" ;; *-osf*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-O2 -msym -readonly_strings" ARGS="--disable-ipv6" ;; *-solaris2.[89]) CFLAGS="-O2 -mcpu=v8" CXXFLAGS="-O2 -mcpu=v8" ARGS="--enable-ipv6" ;; *-solaris2*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-mr -Qn -xstrconst -xO2 -xtarget=generic" CXX=CC CXXFLAGS="-xO2 -xtarget=generic" ;; esac
./configure CC="${CC:-gcc}" CFLAGS="${CFLAGS:--O2}" \ CPPFLAGS="-I${SB_VAR_LIBPOPT_INC} -I${SB_VAR_GETTEXT_INC}" \ CXX="${CXX:-g++}" CXXFLAGS="${CXXFLAGS:--O2}" \ LDFLAGS="-L${SB_VAR_LIBPOPT_LIB} -L${SB_VAR_GETTEXT_LIB} \ -L${SB_VAR_FCPACKAGE_LIB} ${CC_LD_RT}${SB_VAR_LIBPOPT_LIB}:\ ${SB_VAR_LIBGLIB_LIB}:${SB_VAR_LIBGTK_LIB}:${SB_VAR_LIBPANGO_LIB}:\ ${SB_VAR_LIBATK_LIB}:${SB_VAR_LIBXML_LIB}:${SB_VAR_ZLIB_LIB}:\ ${SB_VAR_GETTEXT_LIB} ${LDFLAGS+${LDFLAGS}}" \ PKG_CONFIG_PATH="${SB_VAR_LIBGLIB_LIB}/pkgconfig:\ ${SB_VAR_LIBATK_LIB}/pkgconfig:${SB_VAR_LIBPANGO_LIB}/pkgconfig:\ ${SB_VAR_LIBGTK_LIB}/pkgconfig:${SB_VAR_FCPACKAGE_LIB}/pkgconfig:\ ${SB_VAR_LIBTTF_LIB}/pkgconfig:${SB_VAR_LIBXML_LIB}/pkgconfig:\ ${SB_VAR_LIBGLADE_LIB}/pkgconfig:${SB_VAR_LIBART_LIB}/pkgconfig:\ ${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX}/lib/pkgconfig:${SB_VAR_GETTEXT_LIB}/pkgconfig\ ${SB_VAR_LIBICONV+:${SB_VAR_LIBICONV_LIB}/pkgconfig}" \ --datadir="${_datadir}" --sysconfdir="${_sysconfdir}" \ --localstatedir="${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX}/lib" \ --with-gconf-schema-file-dir="${_sysconfdir}/gconf/schemas" \ --enable-gconf-source="xml::${_sysconfdir}/gconf/gconf.xml.defaults" \ --disable-dependency-tracking ${ARGS+${ARGS}} \ --prefix=${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX}

module.name: libbonoboui
metacity
module.configure:
case "${SYSTYPE}" in *-aix*) CC=xlc CFLAGS="-O2 -qmaxmem=-1 -qarch=com" LDFLAGS="-Wl,-brtl -Wl,-blibpath:/usr/lib" ;; *-hpux*) CC="cc -Ae" CFLAGS="+O2 -z +ESlit +Onofltacc +DAportable \ +Oentrysched +Odataprefetch +Onolimit" ;; *-irix6*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-Wl,-woff,84 -Wl,-woff,85 -woff 1429 -O2 \ -OPT:Olimit=0" ;; *-osf*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-O2 -msym -readonly_strings" ;; *-solaris2.[89]) CFLAGS="-O2 -mcpu=v8" ;; *-solaris2*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-mr -Qn -xstrconst -xO2 -xtarget=generic"
# without -Xc, __STDC__ defined but not defined to 1. set # -DANSICPP to get correct SIZEOF() definition CPPFLAGS="-DANSICPP" ;; esac
./configure CC="${CC:-gcc}" CFLAGS="${CFLAGS:--O2}" \ CPPFLAGS="-I${SB_VAR_GETTEXT_INC} ${CPPFLAGS+${CPPFLAGS}}" \ LDFLAGS="-L${SB_VAR_GETTEXT_LIB} -L${SB_VAR_FCPACKAGE_LIB} \ ${LDFLAGS+${LDFLAGS}}" \ PKG_CONFIG_PATH="${SB_VAR_LIBGLIB_LIB}/pkgconfig:\ ${SB_VAR_LIBGTK_LIB}/pkgconfig:${SB_VAR_LIBPANGO_LIB}/pkgconfig:\ ${SB_VAR_LIBATK_LIB}/pkgconfig:${SB_VAR_FCPACKAGE_LIB}/pkgconfig:\ ${SB_VAR_LIBTTF_LIB}/pkgconfig:${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX}/lib/pkgconfig:\ ${SB_VAR_GETTEXT_LIB}/pkgconfig\ ${SB_VAR_LIBICONV+:${SB_VAR_LIBICONV_LIB}/pkgconfig}" \ --datadir="${_datadir}" --localstatedir="${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX}/lib" \ --with-gconf-source="xml::${_sysconfdir}/gconf/gconf.xml.defaults" \ --with-gconf-schema-file-dir="${_sysconfdir}/gconf/schemas" \ --enable-shared --enable-static --disable-dependency-tracking \ --prefix=${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX}
for _pc in src/libmetacity-private.pc; do ${SB_PATH_SHTOOL} subst -q -e "\ s!-L\(\${libdir}\)!-L\1 ${CC_LD_RT}\1!" ${_pc} done

module.name: libwnck
gnome-keyring
gnome-icon-theme
eog
module.configure:
case "${SB_SYSTYPE}" in *-aix*) CC=xlc CFLAGS="-O2 -qmaxmem=-1 -qarch=com" LDFLAGS="-Wl,-brtl -Wl,-blibpath:/usr/lib" ;; *-hpux*) CC=cc CFLAGS="+O2 -z +ESlit +Onofltacc +DAportable \ +Oentrysched +Odataprefetch +Onolimit" ;; *-irix6*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-Wl,-woff,84 -Wl,-woff,85 -woff 1429 -O2 \ -OPT:Olimit=0" ;; *-osf*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-O2 -msym -readonly_strings" ;; *-solaris2.[89]) CFLAGS="-O2 -mcpu=v8" ;; *-solaris2*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-mr -Qn -xstrconst -xO2 -xtarget=generic" ;; esac
./configure CC="${CC:-gcc}" CFLAGS="${CFLAGS:--O2}" \ CPPFLAGS="-I${JPEG_INC} -I${SB_VAR_LIBPNG_INC} \ -I${SB_VAR_ZLIB_INC} -I${SB_VAR_LIBPOPT_INC} \ -I${SB_VAR_GETTEXT_INC}" LDFLAGS="-L${JPEG_LIB} \ -L${SB_VAR_LIBPNG_LIB} -L${SB_VAR_ZLIB_LIB} \ -L${SB_VAR_LIBPOPT_LIB} -L${SB_VAR_GETTEXT_LIB} \ -L${SB_VAR_FCPACKAGE_LIB} ${CC_LD_RT}${SB_VAR_JPEG_LIB}:\ ${SB_VAR_LIBPNG_LIB}:${SB_VAR_LIBPOPT_LIB}:\ ${SB_VAR_LIBGLIB_LIB}:${SB_VAR_LIBGTK_LIB}:${SB_VAR_LIBATK_LIB}:\ ${SB_VAR_LIBPANGO_LIB}:${SB_VAR_LIBXML_LIB}:${SB_VAR_ZLIB_LIB}:\ ${SB_VAR_GETTEXT_LIB} ${LDFLAGS+${LDFLAGS}}" \ PKG_CONFIG_PATH="${SB_VAR_LIBGLIB_LIB}/pkgconfig:\ ${SB_VAR_LIBATK_LIB}/pkgconfig:${SB_VAR_LIBPANGO_LIB}/pkgconfig:\ ${SB_VAR_LIBGTK_LIB}/pkgconfig:${SB_VAR_FCPACKAGE_LIB}/pkgconfig:\ ${SB_VAR_LIBTTF_LIB}/pkgconfig:${SB_VAR_LIBXML_LIB}/pkgconfig:\ ${SB_VAR_LIBXSLT_LIB}/pkgconfig:${SB_VAR_LIBART_LIB}/pkgconfig:\ ${SB_VAR_LIBGLADE_LIB}/pkgconfig:${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX}/lib/pkgconfig:\ ${SB_VAR_GETTEXT_LIB}/pkgconfig\ ${SB_VAR_LIBICONV+:${SB_VAR_LIBICONV_LIB}/pkgconfig}" \ --datadir="${_datadir}" --sysconfdir="${_sysconfdir}" \ --enable-gconf-source="xml::${_sysconfdir}/gconf/gconf.xml.defaults" \ --disable-dependency-tracking --enable-shared --enable-static \ --without-libexif --prefix=${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX}

module.configure:
case "${SB_SYSTYPE}" in *-aix*) CC=xlc CFLAGS="-O2 -qmaxmem=-1 -qarch=com" LDFLAGS="-Wl,-brtl -Wl,-blibpath:/usr/lib" ;; *-hpux*) CC=cc CFLAGS="+O2 -z +ESlit +Onofltacc +DAportable \ +Oentrysched +Odataprefetch +Onolimit" ;; *-irix6*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-Wl,-woff,84 -Wl,-woff,85 -woff 1429 -O2 \ -OPT:Olimit=0" ;; *-osf*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-O2 -msym -readonly_strings" ;; *-solaris2.[89]) CFLAGS="-O2 -mcpu=v8" ;; *-solaris2*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-mr -Qn -xstrconst -xO2 -xtarget=generic" ;; esac

module.configure:
case "${SB_SYSTYPE}" in *-aix*) CC=xlc CFLAGS="-O2 -qmaxmem=-1 -qarch=com" LDFLAGS="-Wl,-brtl -Wl,-blibpath:/usr/lib" ;; *-hpux*) CC=cc CFLAGS="+O2 -z +ESlit +Onofltacc +DAportable \ +Oentrysched +Odataprefetch +Onolimit" ;; *-irix6*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-Wl,-woff,84 -Wl,-woff,85 -woff 1429 -O2 \ -OPT:Olimit=0" ;; *-osf*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-O2 -msym -readonly_strings" ;; *-solaris2.[89]) CFLAGS="-O2 -mcpu=v8" ;; *-solaris2*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-mr -Qn -xstrconst -xO2 -xtarget=generic" ;; esac

module.configure:
case "${SB_SYSTYPE}" in *-aix*) CC=xlc CFLAGS="-O2 -qmaxmem=-1 -qarch=com" LDFLAGS="-Wl,-brtl -Wl,-blibpath:/usr/lib" ;; *-hpux*) CC=cc CFLAGS="+O2 -z +ESlit +Onofltacc +DAportable \ +Oentrysched +Odataprefetch +Onolimit" ;; *-irix6*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-Wl,-woff,84 -Wl,-woff,85 -woff 1429 -O2 \ -OPT:Olimit=0" ;; *-osf*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-O2 -msym -readonly_strings" ;; *-solaris2.[89]) CFLAGS="-O2 -mcpu=v8" ;; *-solaris2*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-mr -Qn -xstrconst -xO2 -xtarget=generic" ;; esac

module.name: libgnomeui

module.configure:
case "${SB_SYSTYPE}" in *-aix*) CC=xlc CFLAGS="-O2 -qmaxmem=-1 -qarch=com" LDFLAGS="-Wl,-brtl -Wl,-blibpath:/usr/lib" ;; *-hpux*) CC=cc CFLAGS="+O2 -z +ESlit +Onofltacc +DAportable \ +Oentrysched +Odataprefetch +Onolimit" ;; *-irix6*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-Wl,-woff,84 -Wl,-woff,85 -woff 1429 -O2 -OPT:Olimit=0" ;; *-osf*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-O2 -msym -readonly_strings" ;; *-solaris2.[89]) CFLAGS="-O2 -mcpu=v8" ;; *-solaris2*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-mr -Qn -xstrconst -xO2 -xtarget=generic" ;; esac
./configure CC="${CC:-gcc}" CFLAGS="${CFLAGS:--O2}" \ CPPFLAGS="-I${SB_VAR_LIBPOPT_INC} -I${SB_VAR_GETTEXT_INC}" \ LDFLAGS="-L${SB_VAR_LIBPOPT_LIB} -L${SB_VAR_GETTEXT_LIB} \ -L${SB_VAR_FCPACKAGE_LIB} ${CC_LD_RT}${SB_VAR_LIBPOPT_LIB}:\ ${SB_VAR_GETTEXT_LIB} ${LDFLAGS+${LDFLAGS}}" \ PKG_CONFIG_PATH="${SB_VAR_LIBGLIB_LIB}/pkgconfig:\ ${SB_VAR_LIBATK_LIB}/pkgconfig:${SB_VAR_LIBPANGO_LIB}/pkgconfig:\ ${SB_VAR_LIBGTK_LIB}/pkgconfig:${SB_VAR_FCPACKAGE_LIB}/pkgconfig:\ ${SB_VAR_LIBTTF_LIB}/pkgconfig:${SB_VAR_LIBART_LIB}/pkgconfig:\ ${SB_VAR_LIBXML_LIB}/pkgconfig:${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX}/lib/pkgconfig:\ ${SB_VAR_GETTEXT_LIB}/pkgconfig\ ${SB_VAR_LIBICONV+:${SB_VAR_LIBICONV_LIB}/pkgconfig}" \ --datadir="${_datadir}" --sysconfdir="${_sysconfdir}" \ --enable-gconf-source="xml::${_sysconfdir}/gconf/gconf.xml.defaults" \ --disable-dependency-tracking --enable-shared --enable-static \ --prefix=${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX}

module.name: gnome-session
module.configure:
case "${SB_SYSTYPE}" in *-aix*) CC=xlc CFLAGS="-O2 -qmaxmem=-1 -qarch=com" LDFLAGS="-Wl,-brtl -Wl,-blibpath:/usr/lib" ARGS="--disable-ipv6" ;; *-osf*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-O2 -msym -readonly_strings" ARGS="--disable-ipv6" ;; *-hpux*) CC=cc CFLAGS="+O2 -z +ESlit +Onofltacc +DAportable \ +Oentrysched +Odataprefetch +Onolimit" CPPFLAGS="-I/usr/contrib/X11R6/include" LDFLAGS="-L/usr/contrib/X11R6/lib" ARGS="--disable-ipv6" ;; *-irix6*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-Wl,-woff,84 -Wl,-woff,85 -woff 1429 -O2 -OPT:Olimit=0" ARGS="--disable-ipv6" ;; *-linux*) ARGS="--enable-xinerama --enable-ipv6" ;; *-solaris2.[89]) CFLAGS="-O2 -mcpu=v8" ARGS="--enable-ipv6" ;; *-solaris2*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-mr -Qn -xstrconst -xO2 -xtarget=generic" ARGS="--disable-ipv6" ;; esac
./configure CC="${CC:-gcc}" CFLAGS="${CFLAGS:--O2}" \ CPPFLAGS="-I${SB_VAR_LIBPOPT_INC} -I${SB_VAR_GETTEXT_INC} \ ${SB_VAR_TCPWRAP+-I${SB_VAR_TCPWRAP_INC}} ${CPPFLAGS+${CPPFLAGS}}" \ LDFLAGS="-L${SB_VAR_LIBPOPT_LIB} -L${SB_VAR_GETTEXT_LIB} \ -L${SB_VAR_FCPACKAGE_LIB} ${SB_VAR_TCPWRAP+-L${SB_VAR_TCPWRAP_LIB}} \ ${CC_LD_RT}${SB_VAR_LIBPOPT_LIB}\ ${SB_VAR_LIBOPENSSL+:${SB_VAR_LIBOPENSSL_LIB}} ${LDFLAGS+${LDFLAGS}}" \ PKG_CONFIG_PATH="${SB_VAR_LIBGLIB_LIB}/pkgconfig:\ ${SB_VAR_LIBATK_LIB}/pkgconfig:${SB_VAR_LIBPANGO_LIB}/pkgconfig:\ ${SB_VAR_LIBGTK_LIB}/pkgconfig:${SB_VAR_FCPACKAGE_LIB}/pkgconfig:\ ${SB_VAR_LIBTTF_LIB}/pkgconfig:${SB_VAR_LIBXML_LIB}/pkgconfig:\ ${SB_VAR_LIBART_LIB}/pkgconfig:${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX}/lib/pkgconfig:\ ${SB_VAR_LIBAUDIOFILE_LIB}/pkgconfig:${SB_VAR_ESOUND_LIB}/pkgconfig:\ ${SB_VAR_GETTEXT_LIB}/pkgconfig\ ${SB_VAR_LIBICONV+:${SB_VAR_LIBICONV_LIB}/pkgconfig}" \ --datadir="${_datadir}" --sysconfdir="${_sysconfdir}" \ --localstatedir="${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX}/lib" \ --disable-dependency-tracking ${ARGS+${ARGS}} \ --prefix=${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX}

module.name: gtksourceview
